concept.title: Path views
concept.shortdesc: provides three options for visualizing multi-channel customer paths: Separated view, Time-lapsed view, and Merged view.

section.title: Separated view
section.p: The Separated view of the paths in a report shows each path as a separate row in the report. Use this view to compare adjacent touch points across paths. This view is displayed by default when you open the report results.

section.title: Time-lapsed view
section.p: The Time-lapsed view shows the total duration of each path and the relative duration between touch points within the path.

section.title: Merged view
section.p: The Merged view shows when and how paths converge and diverge from each other.
